name: b-Cat BV
goal:
b-Cat is part of the CA Technology Group, where each company in the group has its own specialty.


Production & HQ : Tiel The Netherlands
Own offices in : New Delhi India, Antalya Turkey, Santiago Chili, Krak√≥w Poland
No. Of employees : Around 80
Worldwide active : In > 55 countries

All equipment (hardware and software to control the Controlled Atmosphere in each specialized field is produced in the Netherlands.

All related companies work in the field of an agricultural storage method in which the concentrations of oxygen, carbon dioxide and nitrogen, as well as the temperature and humidity of a storage room are regulated. Both dry commodities and fresh fruit and vegetables can be stored / treated in controlled atmospheres.
interests: Business and Industry, Food Safety, Research and innovation, Sport, Trade
euInitiatives: Regulation (EU) No. 528/2012 welke grootte invloed heeft op onze organisatie maar ook ver daarbuiten.
